short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Start your day with a tranquil sunrise right on your screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your background with a serene sunrise scene, where the soft morning light gently illuminates the sky, creating a peaceful and calming atmosphere. Each time you open a new tab, you'll be immersed in the natural beauty of early morning, bringing a sense of tranquility and refreshment to your workspace.
